it.baywaylabs.jumpersumo.robot

Class Intelligence

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.baywaylabs.jumpersumo.robot.Intelligence

  • public class Intelligence
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a small robot consciousness. There are the keywords that robot use to understand command and respective answers to reply with the world.
    If you want implement more simple commands this is your place.
    Author:
    Massimiliano Fiori [massimiliano.fiori@aol.it]
    See Also:
    Interpreter
